I get lots of compliments on this jacket!  True to size.  Great value for the money.  It's bold, striking and different.  Love it!
I loved the look and fit of the jacket.  Received quite a few complements.  I am 5.3, 135lbs and I ordered a medium.  True to size for me.

I bought this originally for an event and it showed up a little late. I made up for it by wearing it regularly for weeks. I’m never wearing it and not getting compliments and questions of where it’s from! It’s comfortable, sized enough for layering, and warm enough to wear on a cool night with short sleeves. Absolutely love it!
Perfect for clubbing or whenever you want to stand out. I would describe the pattern as more urban graffiti than floral. Bold colors.

As others have said, if you run large in the arms and/or boobs; size up. Nice quality and details, bright colors.  UPDATE: I returned the jacket but not because of any fault with the item itself. The try before you buy option with Amazon  is sooo easy to use.
This is so funky and fits my personality.

评论概述: This jacket isn't how it is described.
评论详情: I got this as a gift for my niece for Christmas. First of all, the thing that actually really upsets me, is the fact the studs are not riveted in like the description said. They are sewn on. Very poorly sewn on. They aren't even metal. They are metallic plastic.  That jacket as a whole feels like a costume store kind of jacket. I have seen fake leather jackets that sell for less with more weight behind them.  If I knew I would get this kind of poor quality from a fake leather jacket. I should of just bought a legit leather one that HWK sells and just took the time to stud it myself. Which I might do if my niece hates this jacket like I do. I feel ashamed of myself thinking this was a steal. The only thing stolen from me is my sense of trust from a company that lies and misrepresents their clothing.
